Richmond.Highland Springs, Virginia:
Highland Springs is a census-designated place located 5 miles East of Richmond,VA (CDP) in Henrico County, Virginia, United States. The population was 15,711 at the 2010 census.


== History ==
Edmund Sewell Read founded the community of Highland Springs in the 1890s as a streetcar suburb of Richmond on the Seven Pines Railway Company's electric street railway line between the city and the National Cemetery at Seven Pines.
